title: Biden crafts inaugural address to unify a country in crisis
description: President-elect Joe Biden has spoken volumes inside the US Capitol over more than four decades, but the weight of those words does not approach the magnitude of the message he will deliver on its steps during his inaugural address Wednesday.

title: Expert has a warning as extremists gather outside Michigan Capitol
description: CNN's Sara Sidner reports on the use of social media by far-right extremists as experts fear the attack on the US Capitol may just be the beginning.

title: 'What is this toad so afraid of?' Putin called out by Navalny
description: Russia's leading Kremlin critic Alexey Navalny is calling on his supporters to hit the streets for nationwide protests in Russia after he was detained by local police moments after returning to the country.

title: Trumps' snub of Bidens is historic in its magnitude
description:
• CNN Investigates: Trump allies stoked flames before Capitol riot
• Analysis: The latest White House excuse for Trump's silence on Capitol attack is the worst yet
• Shocking new video of riot released

title: Melania Trump releases farewell message
description: Melania Trump released a farewell video as she prepares to leave the White House, but the Trumps declined to invite the Bidens to the White House as has been done with past presidents. CNN's Kate Bennett reports.

title: Fired data scientist who accused Florida officials of pandemic cover-up turns herself in to authorities
description: The former Florida data analyst who has accused state officials of covering up the extent of the pandemic has turned herself in to authorities days after a warrant was issued for her arrest, according to the Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE).

title: Britain's 'major crisis' is good and bad news for travelers
description: When the UK Prime Minister addressed the nation on December 20, the news was bad enough: Christmas was canceled.

title: David Axelrod: The scary call I got the night before Barack Obama's inauguration
description: The night before former President Barack Obama's first inauguration, I got an urgent call from Rahm Emanuel, his incoming chief of staff: "Can you call me back right away from a hard line?"

title: Trump Tower on New York's Fifth Avenue to see security scaled down
description: Once a fortress, security in and around Trump Tower on Manhattan's Fifth Avenue will begin to loosen possibly as early as this week when the building's namesake departs the White House.

title: Ford closes German plant for 1 month as global chip crisis worsens
description: Ford has ordered a month-long production halt at one of its plants in Germany, the latest sign that a global shortage of computer chips is putting carmakers under increasing pressure and threatening their recovery from the pandemic.

title: Uganda's lesson to other authoritarians: controlling the internet works
Colombia's 'cocaine hippos' must be culled, scientists say -- but not everyone agrees
description: Colombia's best-known drug trafficker, Pablo Escobar, may have been killed in 1993 but his influence continues to be felt in the country, sometimes in unexpected ways.

title: Teen saves her family who lost their sense of smell from Covid-19 and didn't realize house was on fire
description: A Texas family who lost their sense of smell because they have coronavirus nearly died when a fire engulfed their house and they couldn't smell the smoke.

title: Trump's 11th-hour pardons in keeping with tradition, but the people he's pardoning are not
description: President Donald Trump's expected batch of 100 pardons and commutations on the penultimate day of his presidency won't be the highest of his recent predecessors. But his record of clemency could very well be the most controversial.

title: Watch this rocket launch from the wing of a jumbo jet
description: Virgin Orbit completed its first successful launch into orbit, sending its LauncherOne hurtling to space after deploying from the wing of a retrofitted Boeing 747.

title: Here's where the UK-US special relationship could go under Biden
description: With just days to go until President-elect Joe Biden officially moves into the Oval Office, UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson will be looking to maintain the so-called special relationship between Britain and the US after a deadly insurrection on Capitol Hill saw him distancing himself from President Donald Trump. CNN's Nic Robertson reports.

title: Justin Timberlake reveals new baby's name
description: Justin Timberlake spoke about he and Jessica Biel's second baby together in an interview with Ellen DeGeneres.
